Model

Interface DistanceMetric

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteDistanceMetric, EuclideanDistanceMetric, PolarCoordinateDistanceMetric

    public interface DistanceMetric
    DistanceMetric is an interface class that other distance metric classes can implement in order to allowing user to set a distance metric to a feature. (makes use of the strategy pattern)
    Author:
    Dhrubomoy Das Gupta

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDistanceMetric(Feature f1, Feature f2)
      Returns the distance between two feature

    • Method Detail

      • getDistanceMetric

        double getDistanceMetric(Feature f1,
                         Feature f2)
        Returns the distance between two feature
        Parameters:
        f1 - the first feature
        f2 - the second feature
        Returns:
        distance between them
